entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm.
